tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterIrrigationSystem (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    sensor_location VARCHAR(255),
    water_pressure FLOAT,
    irrigation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE water_sources(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(50),
    water_type VARCHAR(50),
    capacity FLOAT
)
